name: Whispering Woods
description: A dense forest that borders Riverside Village. The trees grow tall and close together, creating a canopy that filters the sunlight. Local legends speak of strange creatures living in its depths.

forest_edge.name: Forest Edge
forest_edge.description: The manicured path from the village ends here, giving way to a narrow trail that winds between the trees. The forest is alive with the sounds of birds and rustling leaves.

forest_path_1.name: Forest Path
forest_path_1.description: The main path continues north into the woods. A smaller, less-used trail branches off to the west.

crossroads.name: Forest Crossroads
crossroads.description: The path splits here. The main trail continues north into deeper woods, while another path leads east towards the sound of running water.

western_thicket.name: Western Thicket
western_thicket.description: A dense thicket of thorny bushes blocks easy passage further west. A small, dark opening is visible at the base of a rocky outcrop to the south.

wolf_den_entrance.name: Wolf Den Entrance
wolf_den_entrance.description: The ground here is littered with bones, and a low growl emanates from a dark cave opening.

wolf_den_cave.name: Wolf Den
wolf_den_cave.description: A cramped, foul-smelling cave that serves as a den for a pack of forest wolves.

clearing.name: Forest Clearing
clearing.description: A peaceful clearing where the trees thin out. Wildflowers grow in the grassy area. An old, dilapidated cabin stands to the south.

abandoned_cabin.name: Abandoned Cabin
abandoned_cabin.description: A dilapidated wooden cabin that appears to have been abandoned for years. The door hangs off its hinges.

dense_woods_1.name: Dense Woods
dense_woods_1.description: The forest grows denser here. The path is harder to follow, and less light filters through the branches. The trail continues north and also seems to climb a ridge to the northwest.

up.name: Wooded Ridge
up.description: You've climbed a short, steep ridge. From here you can see the forest canopy stretching out for miles. The path continues west into a particularly dark and ancient-looking part of the woods.

ruins_approach_path.name: Path to the Ruins
ruins_approach_path.description: The trees here are ancient and moss-covered. You see scattered, vine-choked stones that hint at old construction. The path clearly leads to some manner of ruins to the west.

deep_forest_1.name: Deep Forest
deep_forest_1.description: You are deep within the Whispering Woods. Ancient trees loom overhead, and the ground is covered in thick moss. The way forward is unclear.

deep_forest_2.name: Deeper Forest
deep_forest_2.description: The forest feels ancient and slightly menacing here. Twisted roots cross the path, and shadows seem to dance at the edge of your vision.

stream_approach.name: Approach to the Stream
stream_approach.description: The ground slopes downwards here. You can hear the clear sound of a bubbling stream just ahead to the east.

stream_crossing.name: Stream Crossing
stream_crossing.description: A shallow stream bubbles over smooth stones in a small, cool ravine. Stepping stones offer a way across to the east bank.

east_bank.name: Eastern Bank
east_bank.description: You climb up from the stream bed onto its eastern bank. The forest seems older here, the path less distinct.

ancient_path_1.name: Ancient Path
ancient_path_1.description: This part of the forest feels untouched. The path is faint, marked only by the occasional oddly-placed stone.

spider_nest.name: Spider Nest
spider_nest.description: The trees here are draped in thick, sticky webs. The ground is littered with the desiccated husks of animals.

ancient_path_2.name: End of the Ancient Path
ancient_path_2.description: The faint trail ends here in a small clearing dominated by a single, massive oak tree. An unnatural darkness seems to emanate from the hills to the east.

ancient_oak.name: Ancient Oak
ancient_oak.description: A massive oak tree, its trunk wider than several people. There's a hollow at its base. A dark opening in the hillside to the east leads into the Shadow Caves.
